package.name: HTML_Common
package.summary: PEAR::HTML_Common is a base class for other HTML classes.
package.description: The PEAR::HTML_Common package provides methods for html code display and attributes handling. * Methods to set, remove, update html attributes. * Handles comments in HTML code. * Handles layout and tabs for nicer HTML code.

release.notes: This new release optimizes HTML_Common's way to deal with attributes. * Fix a bug in _parseAttributes when a string was passed to it (Alexey Borzov) * Only key-value associative arrays are now used, XHTML compliant (Alexey Borzov) * Fix a bug related to getAttribute case sensitivity detected by Ian Harder #22628 (Alexey Borzov)
